title: DEFY CEO: Pro Leagues Taking a Serious Look at CBD
itunes:title: DEFY CEO: Pro Leagues Taking a Serious Look at CBD
description:
CBD is getting a hard look from professional sports leagues seeking pain management alternatives. Jason Kelly and Mike Lynch speak with the co-founder and CEO of the CBD sports drink company DEFY, Megan Bushell. The business is co-founded by former Denver Broncos running back Terrell Davis. They discuss the future for CBD products in sports, the difficulties the pandemic pose for DEFY, and the impact of recent legal triumphs for the marijuana industry.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
